availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, commission merchant, produce and flour dealer. Signed a petition in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector. Owner: Albert G. Sanders.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 754.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 12, p. 612A.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 200.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), .
Find A Grave, "Albert G. Saunders (1819-1905)," Memorial 84315636, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84315636 (accessed January 29, 2020).
KYR-0001-017-0163.
